name: hyperevm-dex-aggregator

scripts.schema: wrangler dev src/index.ts --local --port 3000 & npx wait-on http://localhost:3000/openapi.json && curl -s http://localhost:3000/openapi.json | jq > schema.json && pkill -f wrangler
scripts.deploy:aggregator: npm run hardhat:compile && npm run hardhat:deploy
